name: beaver-habit-tracker
description: BeaverHabits is a self-hosted habit tracker that features streaks, graphs, and customizable habit schedules. It is designed to help users build routines and stay motivated using simple tracking and visual cues.
features: Habit Tracking: Build and maintain positive habits. Consistent progress.
Streak Monitoring: Track consecutive days of habit completion. Stay motivated.
Visual Graphs: See your progress with charts and visualizations. Clear insights.
Custom Schedules: Set flexible habit schedules and frequencies. Personalized tracking.
Motivation Tools: Visual cues keep you motivated. Build momentum.
Routine Building: Develop consistent daily routines. Better habits.
Self-Hosted: Keep your habit data completely private. Personal growth.
Simple Tracking: Easy logging of daily habits. Minimal friction.
